name: Outlive (itch)
description:
Hey! Welcome to Outlive, this is my first  "full" game. It is a resource administration/survival game with an apocalyptic theme. Humanity is now haunted down by creatures and you have to survive 365 days in this chaos, if you can of course.

Download Options:

Full Outlive for windows it´s free!

With just 1.99$ you can help me and get outlive for android!
